channel.title: Server on for me but not on for others?
channel.description: i dont get this i can log onto my server but others cant and rune locus says its off but ive had people on before please help?

item.title: Server on for me but not on for others?
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

lil wayne612:

i didnt even have to portfoward from the start. so whats up? i dont know what to do?

Theres your answer.

YOU HAVE TO PORTFORWARD

You can also use Utorrent to portforward
But at the moment you are connecting to your localhost. Ex. You own computer. Ip adress 0.0.0.0

You must portforward and redirect your NO-IP (If you have one) To your Real IP

Read full topic
item.source: Server on for me but not on for others?

item.title: Server on for me but not on for others?
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

your connecting via your local host so only your computer can connect too it, and others in your network, you need too port forward. set up a static ip and set up a no-ip account.

Read full topic
